title: J's Red Yoga Pants
description: Most guys wouldn’t try Hot Yoga if their woman asked them to, but then again Travis isn’t like ‘most guys’. He’s going to need a mat and J knows just the place to take him to get one. Now, if only she could get a minute in the fitting room by herself, she could try on her new Yoga pants.*Warning: Contains explicit content and details, not intended for those under 18
author: Ryan O'Leary
